meanings.definition: A person who aspires to achieve a particular goal or position.
meanings.sent1: The young aspirant dreamed of becoming a doctor one day.
meanings.sent2: She is an aspirant for the position of team captain.
meanings.sent3: The aspiring aspirant practiced medicine on her stuffed animals.
meanings.sent4: Like a determined aspirant, he climbed the ladder of success.
meanings.sent5: The hopeful aspirant studied hard to reach her dream.

meanings.sent1: The aspirant student aimed for straight A's in all subjects.
meanings.sent2: She had an aspirant attitude towards her career goals.
meanings.sent3: The ambitious aspirant set her sights on the stars.
meanings.sent4: His aspirant spirit drove him to pursue excellence in everything.
meanings.sent5: The determined aspirant never gave up on her dreams.
